name: Little Witch (Lucy Bradbury)
description:
A Small Prototype made for my first university game Jam. It is about a Witch who has made herself small and the aim of the game is to gather the right materials scattered around the house to make yourself big once more.

If you have time please fill out my playtest form below to give me some feedback!

https://forms.gle/RkCW2XpztsoFvfZq5
